title: Podcast Magic: Unboxing My Setup Journey! üéôÔ∏è‚ú®
description:
Have you ever wondered about the behind-the-scenes of starting a podcast? Lets have a look at my own personal journey as I unveil the steps, choices, and challenges faced while setting up and it may not be quite what you expect. 

Podcast set up then get guests...right? Well, maybe not!

Lets jump in! üéß

Check out CopyAI: www.copy.ai?via=leo-guinan
As well as PlaygroundAI: https://playgroundai.com/ 

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!
